attributes.action: Dave Coppard Voice of the Pensioners
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
By Dave Coppard      Voice of the Pensioners  dcoppard@tesco,net

Currently Pensioners are in disarray because they are a minority, in scattered groups all over the UK.  What is needed is for the 11 Million Pensioners to have representation under one roof and in the House of Commons. Already established and recognized by government, are the TGWU Retirement Members Association, who already have an established Political Liaison Officer William Jupp, this in my considered opinion, is the only road forward, to have a Voice and Seat in the House of Commons, as if left up to our MP's, matters will continue to Stagnate Indefinitely.
Should you wish to contact the Retirement Members' Association, e-mail address for William Jupp  william.jupp@ntlworld.com

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
